name: Free Tram Zone
description:
Free Tram Zone Free Tram Zone is an atmospheric passive adventure reflecting on my experiences travelling on public transport, superimposed on my habit of daydreaming. Taking long trips between suburbs I might never truly explore, and how many wonderful things might be hiding within them, journeying between worlds and realities that are only to be experienced through the windows of a rattling tram.

This game is graphically intensive and may not perform well on older PCs, if this occurs to you please feel free to share your system specs so a recommended specs sheet can be made.

How to Play: Mouse:       Aim Camera
WSAD:       Movement
Left Ctrl:    Crouch
Esc:              Exit Game

Your tram journey will span across wildly different areas, however each takes only about one minute, the game is a 5 minute experience in total.

Asset List:

Free Tram Zone was made for an assignment focused on importing a variety of free assets to make a cohesive experience. All assets were used with respect to their licenses and their creators.

  • First Person All-in-One by Aedan Graves
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/input-management/first-person-all-in...
  • Lowpoly Vintage Streetcar by Flovi Studios
    • https://skfb.ly/6XRSW
  • Destroyed City FREE by Profi Developers
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/destroyed-city-free...
  • Organodron City by Herminio Nieves
    • https://free3d.com/3d-model/organodron-city-22304.html
  • Planet Earth Free by headwards
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/planet-earth-free-2...
  • Unity VFX & Shader Graph - Black Hole Effect Tutorial by Gabrial Aguiar Prod.
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FlE8e1JwVzs
  • OCEAN shader with Unity Shader Graph! by PolyTools
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FbTAbOnhRcI
  • 360 Space Panorama III by ERA-7
    • https://cubebrush.co/era7/products/mtnig/free-360-space-panorama-iii
  • Sound Effects by Spanac at Free Sounds Library:
    • https://www.freesoundslibrary.com/
